main event: A brightly lit object was observed maneuvering at an altitude of 20,000-25,000 feet in Sacramento, California on November 9, 1957.
interesting points: The object was approximately 10-50 feet in diameter and left a fluorescent bluish trail,The sighting lasted for 2.3 minutes,The report includes a detailed flight path and wind conditions at various altitudes,Hovering distance was lost after 20 degrees of rotation observed,The report contains redacted witness testimony detailing a silent, bright light hovering at 50 feet off the ground.
sighted object: brightly lit object with a bluish trail
witness description: Mr. [Redacted] stated he observed a bright light hovering silently.
